hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"I remember lying in front of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was praying. When he wanted to prostrate he would nudge my foot and I would draw it up (out of the way) until he had finished prostrating

chapter.ara-name: باب تَرْكِ الْوُضُوءِ مِنْ مَسِّ الرَّجُلِ امْرَأَتَهُ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَهْوَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Not Performing Wudu' When A Man Touches His Wife Without Desire
